name: Ezekiel 23:13
text: I saw that she was defiled; they both took one way.

name: Ezekiel 23:14
text: She increased her prostitution; for she saw men portrayed on the wall, the images of the Chaldeans portrayed with vermilion,

name: Ezekiel 23:15
text: dressed with girdles on their waists, with flowing turbans on their heads, all of them princes to look on, after the likeness of the Babylonians in Chaldea, the land of their birth.

name: Ezekiel 23:16
text: As soon as she saw them she doted on them, and sent messengers to them into Chaldea.

name: Ezekiel 23:17
text: The Babylonians came to her into the bed of love, and they defiled her with their prostitution, and she was polluted with them, and her soul was alienated from them.

name: Ezekiel 23:18
text: So she uncovered her prostitution, and uncovered her nakedness: then my soul was alienated from her, like as my soul was alienated from her sister.

name: Ezekiel 23:19
text: Yet she multiplied her prostitution, remembering the days of her youth, in which she had played the prostitute in the land of Egypt.

name: Ezekiel 23:20
text: She doted on their paramours, whose flesh is as the flesh of donkeys, and whose issue is like the issue of horses.

name: Ezekiel 23:21
text: Thus you called to memory the lewdness of your youth, in the handling of your bosom by the Egyptians for the breasts of your youth.

name: Ezekiel 23:22
text: Therefore, Oholibah, thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I will raise up your lovers against you, from whom your soul is alienated, and I will bring them against you on every side:

name: Ezekiel 23:23
text: the Babylonians and all the Chaldeans, Pekod and Shoa and Koa, and all the Assyrians with them; desirable young men, governors and rulers all of them, princes and men of renown, all of them riding on horses.

name: Ezekiel 23:24
text: They shall come against you with weapons, chariots, and wagons, and with a company of peoples; they shall set themselves against you with buckler and shield and helmet all around; and I will commit the judgment to them, and they shall judge you according to their judgments.

name: Ezekiel 23:25
text: I will set my jealousy against you, and they shall deal with you in fury; they shall take away your nose and your ears; and your residue shall fall by the sword: they shall take your sons and your daughters; and your residue shall be devoured by the fire.

name: Ezekiel 23:26
text: They shall also strip you of your clothes, and take away your beautiful jewels.

name: Ezekiel 23:27
text: Thus will I make your lewdness to cease from you, and your prostitution brought from the land of Egypt; so that you shall not lift up your eyes to them, nor remember Egypt any more.

name: Ezekiel 23:28
text: For thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I will deliver you into the hand of them whom you hate, into the hand of them from whom your soul is alienated;

name: Ezekiel 23:29
text: and they shall deal with you in hatred, and shall take away all your labor, and shall leave you naked and bare; and the nakedness of your prostitution shall be uncovered, both your lewdness and your prostitution.

name: Ezekiel 23:30
text: These things shall be done to you, because you have played the prostitute after the nations, and because you are polluted with their idols.

name: Ezekiel 23:31
text: You have walked in the way of your sister; therefore will I give her cup into your hand.

name: Ezekiel 23:32
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: You will drink of your sister"s cup, which is deep and large; you will be ridiculed and held in derision; it contains much.

name: Ezekiel 23:33
text: You shall be filled with drunkenness and sorrow, with the cup of astonishment and desolation, with the cup of your sister Samaria.

name: Ezekiel 23:34
text: You shall even drink it and drain it out, and you shall gnaw the broken pieces of it, and shall tear your breasts; for I have spoken it, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 23:35
text: Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: Because you have forgotten me, and cast me behind your back, therefore you also bear your lewdness and your prostitution.

name: Ezekiel 23:36
text: Yahweh said moreover to me: Son of man, will you judge Oholah and Oholibah? then declare to them their abominations.

name: Ezekiel 23:37
text: For they have committed adultery, and blood is in their hands; and with their idols have they committed adultery; and they have also caused their sons, whom they bore to me, to pass through the fire to them to be devoured.

name: Ezekiel 23:38
text: Moreover this they have done to me: they have defiled my sanctuary in the same day, and have profaned my Sabbaths.

name: Ezekiel 23:39
text: For when they had slain their children to their idols, then they came the same day into my sanctuary to profane it; and behold, thus have they done in the midst of my house.

name: Ezekiel 23:40
text: Furthermore you have sent for men who come from far, to whom a messenger was sent, and behold, they came; for whom you did wash yourself, paint your eyes, and decorate yourself with ornaments,

name: Ezekiel 23:41
text: and sit on a stately bed, with a table prepared before it, whereupon you set my incense and my oil.

name: Ezekiel 23:42
text: The voice of a multitude being at ease was with her: and with men of the common sort were brought drunkards from the wilderness; and they put bracelets on their hands twain, and beautiful crowns on their heads.

name: Ezekiel 23:43
text: Then I said of her who was old in adulteries, Now will they play the prostitute with her, and she with them.

name: Ezekiel 23:44
text: They went in to her, as they go in to a prostitute: so went they in to Oholah and to Oholibah, the lewd women.

name: Ezekiel 23:45
text: Righteous men, they shall judge them with the judgment of adulteresses, and with the judgment of women who shed blood; because they are adulteresses, and blood is in their hands.

name: Ezekiel 23:46
text: For thus says the Lord Yahweh: I will bring up a company against them, and will give them to be tossed back and forth and robbed.

name: Ezekiel 23:47
text: The company shall stone them with stones, and dispatch them with their swords; they shall kill their sons and their daughters, and burn up their houses with fire.

name: Ezekiel 23:48
text: Thus will I cause lewdness to cease out of the land, that all women may be taught not to do after your lewdness.

name: Ezekiel 23:49
text: They shall recompense your lewdness on you, and you shall bear the sins of your idols; and you shall know that I am the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 24:1
text: Again, in the ninth year, in the tenth month, in the tenth day of the month, the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 24:2
text: Son of man, write the name of the day, even of this same day: the king of Babylon drew close to Jerusalem this same day.

name: Ezekiel 24:3
text: Utter a parable to the rebellious house, and tell them, Thus says the Lord Yahweh, Set on the caldron, set it on, and also pour water into it:

name: Ezekiel 24:4
text: gather its pieces into it, even every good piece, the thigh, and the shoulder; fill it with the choice bones.

name: Ezekiel 24:5
text: Take the choice of the flock, and also a pile of wood for the bones under the caldron; make it boil well; yes, let its bones be boiled in its midst.

name: Ezekiel 24:6
text: Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: Woe to the bloody city, to the caldron whose rust is therein, and whose rust is not gone out of it! take out of it piece after piece; No lot is fallen on it.

name: Ezekiel 24:7
text: For her blood is in the midst of her; she set it on the bare rock; she didn"t pour it on the ground, to cover it with dust.

name: Ezekiel 24:8
text: That it may cause wrath to come up to take vengeance, I have set her blood on the bare rock, that it should not be covered.

name: Ezekiel 24:9
text: Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: Woe to the bloody city! I also will make the pile great.

name: Ezekiel 24:10
text: Heap on the wood, make the fire hot, boil well the flesh, and make thick the broth, and let the bones be burned.

name: Ezekiel 24:11
text: Then set it empty on its coals, that it may be hot, and its brass may burn, and that its filthiness may be molten in it, that its rust may be consumed.

name: Ezekiel 24:12
text: She has wearied herself with toil; yet her great rust doesn"t go forth out of her; her rust doesn"t go forth by fire.

name: Ezekiel 24:13
text: In your filthiness is lewdness: because I have cleansed you and you weren"t cleansed, you shall not be cleansed from your filthiness any more, until I have caused my wrath toward you to rest.

name: Ezekiel 24:14
text: I, Yahweh, have spoken it: it shall happen, and I will do it: I will not go back, neither will I spare, neither will I repent; according to your ways, and according to your doings, shall they judge you, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 24:15
text: Also the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 24:16
text: Son of man, behold, I will take away from you the desire of your eyes with a stroke: yet you shall neither mourn nor weep, neither shall your tears run down.

name: Ezekiel 24:17
text: Sigh, but not aloud, make no mourning for the dead; bind your headdress on you, and put your shoes on your feet, and don"t cover your lips, and don"t eat men"s bread.

name: Ezekiel 24:18
text: So I spoke to the people in the morning; and at even my wife died; and I did in the morning as I was commanded.

name: Ezekiel 24:19
text: The people said to me, Won"t you tell us what these things are to us, that you do so?

name: Ezekiel 24:20
text: Then I said to them, The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 24:21
text: Speak to the house of Israel, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I will profane my sanctuary, the pride of your power, the desire of your eyes, and that which your soul pities; and your sons and your daughters whom you have left behind shall fall by the sword.

name: Ezekiel 24:22
text: You shall do as I have done: you shall not cover your lips, nor eat the bread of men.

name: Ezekiel 24:23
text: Your tires shall be on your heads, and your shoes on your feet: you shall not mourn nor weep; but you shall pine away in your iniquities, and moan one toward another.

name: Ezekiel 24:24
text: Thus Ezekiel shall be a sign to you; according to all that he has done, you will do. When this comes, then you will know that I am the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 24:25
text: You, son of man, shall it not be in the day when I take from them their strength, the joy of their glory, the desire of their eyes, and that whereupon they set their heart, their sons and their daughters,

name: Ezekiel 24:26
text: that in that day he who escapes shall come to you, to cause you to hear it with your ears?

name: Ezekiel 24:27
text: In that day your mouth will be opened to him who has escaped, and you shall speak, and be no more mute: so you will be a sign to them; and they shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 25:1
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 25:2
text: Son of man, set your face toward the children of Ammon, and prophesy against them:

name: Ezekiel 25:3
text: and tell the children of Ammon, Hear the word of the Lord Yahweh: Thus says the Lord Yahweh, Because you said, Aha, against my sanctuary, when it was profaned; and against the land of Israel, when it was made desolate; and against the house of Judah, when they went into captivity:

name: Ezekiel 25:4
text: therefore, behold, I will deliver you to the children of the east for a possession, and they shall set their encampments in you, and make their dwellings in you; they shall eat your fruit, and they shall drink your milk.

name: Ezekiel 25:5
text: I will make Rabbah a stable for camels, and the children of Ammon a resting place for flocks: and you shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 25:6
text: For thus says the Lord Yahweh: Because you have clapped your hands, and stamped with the feet, and rejoiced with all the despite of your soul against the land of Israel;

name: Ezekiel 25:7
text: therefore, behold, I have stretched out my hand on you, and will deliver you for a spoil to the nations; and I will cut you off from the peoples, and I will cause you to perish out of the countries: I will destroy you; and you shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 25:8
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Because Moab and Seir say, Behold, the house of Judah is like all the nations;

name: Ezekiel 25:9
text: therefore, behold, I will open the side of Moab from the cities, from his cities which are on his frontiers, the glory of the country, Beth Jeshimoth, Baal Meon, and Kiriathaim,

name: Ezekiel 25:10
text: to the children of the east, to go against the children of Ammon; and I will give them for a possession, that the children of Ammon may not be remembered among the nations.

name: Ezekiel 25:11
text: and I will execute judgments on Moab; and they shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 25:12
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Because Edom has dealt against the house of Judah by taking vengeance, and has greatly offended, and revenged himself on them;

name: Ezekiel 25:13
text: therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh, I will stretch out my hand on Edom, and will cut off man and animal from it; and I will make it desolate from Teman; even to Dedan shall they fall by the sword.

name: Ezekiel 25:14
text: I will lay my vengeance on Edom by the hand of my people Israel; and they shall do in Edom according to my anger and according to my wrath; and they shall know my vengeance, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 25:15
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Because the Philistines have dealt by revenge, and have taken vengeance with despite of soul to destroy with perpetual enmity;

name: Ezekiel 25:16
text: therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh, Behold, I will stretch out my hand on the Philistines, and I will cut off the Cherethites, and destroy the remnant of the sea coast.

name: Ezekiel 25:17
text: I will execute great vengeance on them with wrathful rebukes; and they shall know that I am Yahweh, when I shall lay my vengeance on them.

name: Ezekiel 26:1
text: It happened in the eleventh year, in the first day of the month, that the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 26:2
text: Son of man, because Tyre has said against Jerusalem, Aha, she is broken: the gate of the peoples; she is turned to me; I shall be replenished, now that she is laid waste:

name: Ezekiel 26:3
text: therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh, Behold, I am against you, Tyre, and will cause many nations to come up against you, as the sea causes its waves to come up.

name: Ezekiel 26:4
text: They shall destroy the walls of Tyre, and break down her towers: I will also scrape her dust from her, and make her a bare rock.

name: Ezekiel 26:5
text: She shall be a place for the spreading of nets in the midst of the sea; for I have spoken it, says the Lord Yahweh; and she shall become a spoil to the nations.

name: Ezekiel 26:6
text: Her daughters who are in the field shall be slain with the sword: and they shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 26:7
text: For thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I will bring on Tyre Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, king of kings, from the north, with horses, and with chariots, and with horsemen, and a company, and many people.

name: Ezekiel 26:8
text: He shall kill your daughters in the field with the sword; and he shall make forts against you, and cast up a mound against you, and raise up the buckler against you.

name: Ezekiel 26:9
text: He shall set his battering engines against your walls, and with his axes he shall break down your towers.

name: Ezekiel 26:10
text: By reason of the abundance of his horses their dust shall cover you: your walls shall shake at the noise of the horsemen, and of the wagons, and of the chariots, when he shall enter into your gates, as men enter into a city in which is made a breach.

name: Ezekiel 26:11
text: With the hoofs of his horses shall he tread down all your streets; he shall kill your people with the sword; and the pillars of your strength shall go down to the ground.

name: Ezekiel 26:12
text: They shall make a spoil of your riches, and make a prey of your merchandise; and they shall break down your walls, and destroy your pleasant houses; and they shall lay your stones and your timber and your dust in the midst of the waters.

name: Ezekiel 26:13
text: I will cause the noise of your songs to cease; and the sound of your harps shall be no more heard.

name: Ezekiel 26:14
text: I will make you a bare rock; you shall be a place for the spreading of nets; you shall be built no more: for I Yahweh have spoken it, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 26:15
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh to Tyre: shall not the islands shake at the sound of your fall, when the wounded groan, when the slaughter is made in the midst of you?

name: Ezekiel 26:16
text: Then all the princes of the sea shall come down from their thrones, and lay aside their robes, and strip off their embroidered garments: they shall clothe themselves with trembling; they shall sit on the ground, and shall tremble every moment, and be astonished at you.

name: Ezekiel 26:17
text: They shall take up a lamentation over you, and tell you, How you are destroyed, who were inhabited by seafaring men, the renowned city, who was strong in the sea, she and her inhabitants, who caused their terror to be on all who lived there!

name: Ezekiel 26:18
text: Now shall the islands tremble in the day of your fall; yes, the islands that are in the sea shall be dismayed at your departure.

name: Ezekiel 26:19
text: For thus says the Lord Yahweh: When I shall make you a desolate city, like the cities that are not inhabited; when I shall bring up the deep on you, and the great waters shall cover you;

name: Ezekiel 26:20
text: then will I bring you down with those who descend into the pit, to the people of old time, and will make you to dwell in the lower parts of the earth, in the places that are desolate of old, with those who go down to the pit, that you be not inhabited; and I will set glory in the land of the living:

name: Ezekiel 26:21
text: I will make you a terror, and you shall no more have any being; though you are sought for, yet you will never be found again, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 27:1
text: The word of Yahweh came again to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 27:2
text: You, son of man, take up a lamentation over Tyre;

name: Ezekiel 27:3
text: and tell Tyre, you who dwell at the entry of the sea, who are the merchant of the peoples to many islands, thus says the Lord Yahweh: You, Tyre, have said, I am perfect in beauty.

name: Ezekiel 27:4
text: Your borders are in the heart of the seas; your builders have perfected your beauty.

name: Ezekiel 27:5
text: They have made all your planks of fir trees from Senir; they have taken a cedar from Lebanon to make a mast for you.

name: Ezekiel 27:6
text: Of the oaks of Bashan have they made your oars; they have made your benches of ivory inlaid in boxwood, from the islands of Kittim.

name: Ezekiel 27:7
text: Of fine linen with embroidered work from Egypt was your sail, that it might be to you for a banner; blue and purple from the islands of Elishah was your awning.

name: Ezekiel 27:8
text: The inhabitants of Sidon and Arvad were your rowers: your wise men, Tyre, were in you, they were your pilots.

name: Ezekiel 27:9
text: The old men of Gebal and the wise men of it were in you your repairers of ship seams: all the ships of the sea with their mariners were in you to deal in your merchandise.

name: Ezekiel 27:10
text: Persia and Lud and Put were in your army, your men of war: they hanged the shield and helmet in you; they set forth your comeliness.

name: Ezekiel 27:11
text: The men of Arvad with your army were on your walls all around, and valorous men were in your towers; they hanged their shields on your walls all around; they have perfected your beauty.

name: Ezekiel 27:12
text: Tarshish was your merchant by reason of the multitude of all kinds of riches; with silver, iron, tin, and lead, they traded for your wares.

name: Ezekiel 27:13
text: Javan, Tubal, and Meshech, they were your traffickers; they traded the persons of men and vessels of brass for your merchandise.

name: Ezekiel 27:14
text: They of the house of Togarmah traded for your wares with horses and war horses and mules.

name: Ezekiel 27:15
text: The men of Dedan were your traffickers; many islands were the market of your hand: they brought you in exchange horns of ivory and ebony.

name: Ezekiel 27:16
text: Syria was your merchant by reason of the multitude of your handiworks: they traded for your wares with emeralds, purple, and embroidered work, and fine linen, and coral, and rubies.

name: Ezekiel 27:17
text: Judah, and the land of Israel, they were your traffickers: they traded for your merchandise wheat of Minnith, and confections, and honey, and oil, and balm.

name: Ezekiel 27:18
text: Damascus was your merchant for the multitude of your handiworks, by reason of the multitude of all kinds of riches, with the wine of Helbon, and white wool.

name: Ezekiel 27:19
text: Vedan and Javan traded with yarn for your wares: bright iron, cassia, and calamus, were among your merchandise.

name: Ezekiel 27:20
text: Dedan was your trafficker in precious cloths for riding.

name: Ezekiel 27:21
text: Arabia, and all the princes of Kedar, they were the merchants of your hand; in lambs, and rams, and goats, in these were they your merchants.

name: Ezekiel 27:22
text: The traffickers of Sheba and Raamah, they were your traffickers; they traded for your wares with the chief of all spices, and with all precious stones, and gold.

name: Ezekiel 27:23
text: Haran and Canneh and Eden, the traffickers of Sheba, Asshur and Chilmad, were your traffickers.

name: Ezekiel 27:24
text: These were your traffickers in choice wares, in wrappings of blue and embroidered work, and in chests of rich clothing, bound with cords and made of cedar, among your merchandise.

name: Ezekiel 27:25
text: The ships of Tarshish were your caravans for your merchandise: and you were replenished, and made very glorious in the heart of the seas.

name: Ezekiel 27:26
text: Your rowers have brought you into great waters: the east wind has broken you in the heart of the seas.

name: Ezekiel 27:27
text: Your riches, and your wares, your merchandise, your mariners, and your pilots, your repairers of ship seams, and the dealers in your merchandise, and all your men of war, who are in you, with all your company which is in the midst of you, shall fall into the heart of the seas in the day of your ruin.

name: Ezekiel 27:28
text: At the sound of the cry of your pilots the suburbs shall shake.

name: Ezekiel 27:29
text: All who handled the oar, the mariners, and all the pilots of the sea, shall come down from their ships; they shall stand on the land,

name: Ezekiel 27:30
text: and shall cause their voice to be heard over you, and shall cry bitterly, and shall cast up dust on their heads, they shall wallow themselves in the ashes:

name: Ezekiel 27:31
text: and they shall make themselves bald for you, and clothe them with sackcloth, and they shall weep for you in bitterness of soul with bitter mourning.

name: Ezekiel 27:32
text: In their wailing they shall take up a lamentation for you, and lament over you, saying, Who is there like Tyre, like her who is brought to silence in the midst of the sea?

name: Ezekiel 27:33
text: When your wares went forth out of the seas, you filled many peoples; you enriched the kings of the earth with the multitude of your riches and of your merchandise.

name: Ezekiel 27:34
text: In the time that you were broken by the seas in the depths of the waters, your merchandise and all your company fell in your midst.

name: Ezekiel 27:35
text: All the inhabitants of the islands are astonished at you, and their kings are horribly afraid; they are troubled in their face.

name: Ezekiel 27:36
text: The merchants among the peoples hiss at you; you are become a terror, and you shall nevermore have any being.

name: Ezekiel 28:1
text: The word of Yahweh came again to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 28:2
text: Son of man, tell the prince of Tyre, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Because your heart is lifted up, and you have said, I am a god, I sit in the seat of God, in the midst of the seas; yet you are man, and not God, though you set your heart as the heart of God"

name: Ezekiel 28:3
text: behold, you are wiser than Daniel; there is no secret that is hidden from you;

name: Ezekiel 28:4
text: by your wisdom and by your understanding you have gotten yourself riches, and have gotten gold and silver into your treasures;

name: Ezekiel 28:5
text: by your great wisdom and by your traffic you have increased your riches, and your heart is lifted up because of your riches"

name: Ezekiel 28:6
text: therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: Because you have set your heart as the heart of God,

name: Ezekiel 28:7
text: therefore, behold, I will bring strangers on you, the terrible of the nations; and they shall draw their swords against the beauty of your wisdom, and they shall defile your brightness.

name: Ezekiel 28:8
text: They shall bring you down to the pit; and you shall die the death of those who are slain, in the heart of the seas.

name: Ezekiel 28:9
text: Will you yet say before him who kills you, I am God? but you are man, and not God, in the hand of him who wounds you.

name: Ezekiel 28:10
text: You shall die the death of the uncircumcised by the hand of strangers: for I have spoken it, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 28:11
text: Moreover the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 28:12
text: Son of man, take up a lamentation over the king of Tyre, and tell him, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: You seal up the sum, full of wisdom, and perfect in beauty.

name: Ezekiel 28:13
text: You were in Eden, the garden of God; every precious stone adorned you: ruby, topaz, emerald, chrysolite, onyx, jasper, sapphire, turquoise, and beryl. Gold work of tambourines and of pipes was in you. In the day that you were created they were prepared.

name: Ezekiel 28:14
text: You were the anointed cherub who covers: and I set you, so that you were on the holy mountain of God; you have walked up and down in the midst of the stones of fire.

name: Ezekiel 28:15
text: You were perfect in your ways from the day that you were created, until unrighteousness was found in you.

name: Ezekiel 28:16
text: By the abundance of your traffic they filled the midst of you with violence, and you have sinned: therefore I have cast you as profane out of the mountain of God; and I have destroyed you, covering cherub, from the midst of the stones of fire.

name: Ezekiel 28:17
text: Your heart was lifted up because of your beauty; you have corrupted your wisdom by reason of your brightness: I have cast you to the ground; I have laid you before kings, that they may see you.

name: Ezekiel 28:18
text: By the multitude of your iniquities, in the unrighteousness of your traffic, you have profaned your sanctuaries; therefore have I brought forth a fire from the midst of you; it has devoured you, and I have turned you to ashes on the earth in the sight of all those who see you.

name: Ezekiel 28:19
text: All those who know you among the peoples shall be astonished at you: you have become a terror, and you shall nevermore have any being.

name: Ezekiel 28:20
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 28:21
text: Son of man, set your face toward Sidon, and prophesy against it,

name: Ezekiel 28:22
text: and say, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I am against you, Sidon; and I will be glorified in the midst of you; and they shall know that I am Yahweh, when I shall have executed judgments in her, and shall be sanctified in her.

name: Ezekiel 28:23
text: For I will send pestilence into her, and blood into her streets; and the wounded shall fall in the midst of her, with the sword on her on every side; and they shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 28:24
text: There shall be no more a pricking brier to the house of Israel, nor a hurting thorn of any that are around them, that scorned them; and they shall know that I am the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 28:25
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: When I shall have gathered the house of Israel from the peoples among whom they are scattered, and shall be sanctified in them in the sight of the nations, then shall they dwell in their own land which I gave to my servant Jacob.

name: Ezekiel 28:26
text: They shall dwell securely therein; yes, they shall build houses, and plant vineyards, and shall dwell securely, when I have executed judgments on all those who do them despite all around them; and they shall know that I am Yahweh their God.

name: Ezekiel 29:1
text: In the tenth year, in the tenth month, on the twelfth day of the month, the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 29:2
text: "Son of man, set your face against Pharaoh king of Egypt, and prophesy against him and against all Egypt.

name: Ezekiel 29:3
text: Speak and say, "Thus says the Lord Yahweh: "Behold, I am against you, Pharaoh king of Egypt, the great monster that lies in the midst of his rivers, that has said, "My river is my own, and I have made it for myself."

name: Ezekiel 29:4
text: I will put hooks in your jaws, and I will make the fish of your rivers stick to your scales; and I will bring you up out of the midst of your rivers, with all the fish of your rivers which stick to your scales.

name: Ezekiel 29:5
text: I"ll cast you forth into the wilderness, you and all the fish of your rivers. You"ll fall on the open field. You won"t be brought together, nor gathered. I have given you for food to the animals of the earth and to the birds of the sky.

name: Ezekiel 29:6
text: All the inhabitants of Egypt will know that I am Yahweh, because they have been a staff of reed to the house of Israel.

name: Ezekiel 29:7
text: When they took hold of you by your hand, you broke, and tore all their shoulders; and when they leaned on you, you broke, and paralyzed all of their thighs."

name: Ezekiel 29:8
text: Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: "Behold, I will bring a sword on you, and will cut off man and animal from you.

name: Ezekiel 29:9
text: The land of Egypt shall be a desolation and a waste; and they shall know that I am Yahweh. Because he has said, "The river is mine, and I have made it;"

name: Ezekiel 29:10
text: therefore, behold, I am against you, and against your rivers, and I will make the land of Egypt an utter waste and desolation, from the tower of Seveneh even to the border of Ethiopia.

name: Ezekiel 29:11
text: No foot of man shall pass through it, nor foot of animal shall pass through it, neither shall it be inhabited forty years.

name: Ezekiel 29:12
text: I will make the land of Egypt a desolation in the midst of the countries that are desolate; and her cities among the cities that are laid waste shall be a desolation forty years; and I will scatter the Egyptians among the nations, and will disperse them through the countries."

name: Ezekiel 29:13
text: For thus says the Lord Yahweh: "At the end of forty years will I gather the Egyptians from the peoples where they were scattered;

name: Ezekiel 29:14
text: and I will bring back the captivity of Egypt, and will cause them to return into the land of Pathros, into the land of their birth; and they shall be there a base kingdom.

name: Ezekiel 29:15
text: It shall be the base of the kingdoms; neither shall it any more lift itself up above the nations: and I will diminish them, that they shall no more rule over the nations.

name: Ezekiel 29:16
text: It shall be no more the confidence of the house of Israel, bringing iniquity to memory, when they turn to look after them: and they shall know that I am the Lord Yahweh."""

name: Ezekiel 29:17
text: It came to pass in the seven and twentieth year, in the first month, in the first day of the month, the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 29:18
text: Son of man, Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon caused his army to serve a great service against Tyre: every head was made bald, and every shoulder was worn; yet had he no wages, nor his army, from Tyre, for the service that he had served against it.

name: Ezekiel 29:19
text: Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I will give the land of Egypt to Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon; and he shall carry off her multitude, and take her spoil, and take her prey; and it shall be the wages for his army.

name: Ezekiel 29:20
text: I have given him the land of Egypt as his recompense for which he served, because they worked for me, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 29:21
text: In that day will I cause a horn to bud forth to the house of Israel, and I will give you the opening of the mouth in their midst; and they shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 30:1
text: The word of Yahweh came again to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 30:2
text: Son of man, prophesy, and say, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Wail, Alas for the day!

name: Ezekiel 30:3
text: For the day is near, even the day of Yahweh is near; it shall be a day of clouds, a time of the nations.

name: Ezekiel 30:4
text: A sword shall come on Egypt, and anguish shall be in Ethiopia, when the slain shall fall in Egypt; and they shall take away her multitude, and her foundations shall be broken down.

name: Ezekiel 30:5
text: Ethiopia, and Put, and Lud, and all the mixed people, and Cub, and the children of the land that is allied with them, shall fall with them by the sword.

name: Ezekiel 30:6
text: Thus says Yahweh: They also who uphold Egypt shall fall; and the pride of her power shall come down: from the tower of Seveneh shall they fall in it by the sword, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 30:7
text: They shall be desolate in the midst of the countries that are desolate; and her cities shall be in the midst of the cities that are wasted.

name: Ezekiel 30:8
text: They shall know that I am Yahweh, when I have set a fire in Egypt, and all her helpers are destroyed.

name: Ezekiel 30:9
text: In that day shall messengers go forth from before me in ships to make the careless Ethiopians afraid; and there shall be anguish on them, as in the day of Egypt; for, behold, it comes.

name: Ezekiel 30:10
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: I will also make the multitude of Egypt to cease, by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon.

name: Ezekiel 30:11
text: He and his people with him, the terrible of the nations, shall be brought in to destroy the land; and they shall draw their swords against Egypt, and fill the land with the slain.

name: Ezekiel 30:12
text: I will make the rivers dry, and will sell the land into the hand of evil men; and I will make the land desolate, and all that is therein, by the hand of strangers: I, Yahweh, have spoken it.

name: Ezekiel 30:13
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: I will also destroy the idols, and I will cause the images to cease from Memphis; and there shall be no more a prince from the land of Egypt: and I will put a fear in the land of Egypt.

name: Ezekiel 30:14
text: I will make Pathros desolate, and will set a fire in Zoan, and will execute judgments on No.

name: Ezekiel 30:15
text: I will pour my wrath on Sin, the stronghold of Egypt; and I will cut off the multitude of No.

name: Ezekiel 30:16
text: I will set a fire in Egypt: Sin shall be in great anguish, and No shall be broken up; and Memphis shall have adversaries in the daytime.

name: Ezekiel 30:17
text: The young men of Aven and of Pibeseth shall fall by the sword; and these cities shall go into captivity.

name: Ezekiel 30:18
text: At Tehaphnehes also the day shall withdraw itself, when I shall break there the yokes of Egypt, and the pride of her power shall cease in her: as for her, a cloud shall cover her, and her daughters shall go into captivity.

name: Ezekiel 30:19
text: Thus will I execute judgments on Egypt; and they shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 30:20
text: It happened in the eleventh year, in the first month, in the seventh day of the month, that the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 30:21
text: Son of man, I have broken the arm of Pharaoh king of Egypt; and behold, it has not been bound up, to apply healing medicines, to put a bandage to bind it, that it be strong to hold the sword.

name: Ezekiel 30:22
text: Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I am against Pharaoh king of Egypt, and will break his arms, the strong arm, and that which was broken; and I will cause the sword to fall out of his hand.

name: Ezekiel 30:23
text: I will scatter the Egyptians among the nations, and will disperse them through the countries.

name: Ezekiel 30:24
text: I will strengthen the arms of the king of Babylon, and put my sword in his hand: but I will break the arms of Pharaoh, and he shall groan before him with the groanings of a deadly wounded man.

name: Ezekiel 30:25
text: I will hold up the arms of the king of Babylon; and the arms of Pharaoh shall fall down; and they shall know that I am Yahweh, when I shall put my sword into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he shall stretch it out on the land of Egypt.

name: Ezekiel 30:26
text: I will scatter the Egyptians among the nations, and disperse them through the countries; and they shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 31:1
text: It happened in the eleventh year, in the third month, in the first day of the month, that the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 31:2
text: Son of man, tell Pharaoh king of Egypt, and to his multitude: Whom are you like in your greatness?

name: Ezekiel 31:3
text: Behold, the Assyrian was a cedar in Lebanon with beautiful branches, and with a forest-like shade, and of high stature; and its top was among the thick boughs.

name: Ezekiel 31:4
text: The waters nourished it, the deep made it to grow: its rivers ran all around its plantation; and it sent out its channels to all the trees of the field.

name: Ezekiel 31:5
text: Therefore its stature was exalted above all the trees of the field; and its boughs were multiplied, and its branches became long by reason of many waters, when it shot them forth.

name: Ezekiel 31:6
text: All the birds of the sky made their nests in its boughs; and under its branches all the animals of the field brought forth their young; and all great nations lived under its shadow.

name: Ezekiel 31:7
text: Thus was it beautiful in its greatness, in the length of its branches; for its root was by many waters.

name: Ezekiel 31:8
text: The cedars in the garden of God could not hide it; the fir trees were not like its boughs, and the plane trees were not as its branches; nor was any tree in the garden of God like it in its beauty.

name: Ezekiel 31:9
text: I made it beautiful by the multitude of its branches, so that all the trees of Eden, that were in the garden of God, envied it.

name: Ezekiel 31:10
text: Therefore thus said the Lord Yahweh: Because you are exalted in stature, and he has set his top among the thick boughs, and his heart is lifted up in his height;

name: Ezekiel 31:11
text: I will even deliver him into the hand of the mighty one of the nations; he shall surely deal with him; I have driven him out for his wickedness.

name: Ezekiel 31:12
text: Strangers, the terrible of the nations, have cut him off, and have left him: on the mountains and in all the valleys his branches are fallen, and his boughs are broken by all the watercourses of the land; and all the peoples of the earth are gone down from his shadow, and have left him.

name: Ezekiel 31:13
text: On his ruin all the birds of the sky shall dwell, and all the animals of the field shall be on his branches;

name: Ezekiel 31:14
text: to the end that none of all the trees by the waters exalt themselves in their stature, neither set their top among the thick boughs, nor that their mighty ones stand up on their height, even all who drink water: for they are all delivered to death, to the lower parts of the earth, in the midst of the children of men, with those who go down to the pit.

name: Ezekiel 31:15
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: In the day when he went down to Sheol I caused a mourning: I covered the deep for him, and I restrained its rivers; and the great waters were stayed; and I caused Lebanon to mourn for him, and all the trees of the field fainted for him.

name: Ezekiel 31:16
text: I made the nations to shake at the sound of his fall, when I cast him down to Sheol with those who descend into the pit; and all the trees of Eden, the choice and best of Lebanon, all that drink water, were comforted in the lower parts of the earth.

name: Ezekiel 31:17
text: They also went down into Sheol with him to those who are slain by the sword; yes, those who were his arm, that lived under his shadow in the midst of the nations.

name: Ezekiel 31:18
text: To whom are you thus like in glory and in greatness among the trees of Eden? yet you will be brought down with the trees of Eden to the lower parts of the earth: you shall lie in the midst of the uncircumcised, with those who are slain by the sword. This is Pharaoh and all his multitude, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 32:1
text: It happened in the twelfth year, in the twelfth month, in the first day of the month, that the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 32:2
text: Son of man, take up a lamentation over Pharaoh king of Egypt, and tell him, You were likened to a young lion of the nations: yet you are as a monster in the seas; and you broke out with your rivers, and troubled the waters with your feet, and fouled their rivers.

name: Ezekiel 32:3
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: I will spread out my net on you with a company of many peoples; and they shall bring you up in my net.

name: Ezekiel 32:4
text: I will leave you on the land, I will cast you forth on the open field, and will cause all the birds of the sky to settle on you, and I will satisfy the animals of the whole earth with you.

name: Ezekiel 32:5
text: I will lay your flesh on the mountains, and fill the valleys with your height.

name: Ezekiel 32:6
text: I will also water with your blood the land in which you swim, even to the mountains; and the watercourses shall be full of you.

name: Ezekiel 32:7
text: When I shall extinguish you, I will cover the heavens, and make its stars dark; I will cover the sun with a cloud, and the moon shall not give its light.

name: Ezekiel 32:8
text: All the bright lights of the sky will I make dark over you, and set darkness on your land, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 32:9
text: I will also trouble the hearts of many peoples, when I shall bring your destruction among the nations, into the countries which you have not known.

name: Ezekiel 32:10
text: Yes, I will make many peoples amazed at you, and their kings shall be horribly afraid for you, when I shall brandish my sword before them; and they shall tremble at every moment, every man for his own life, in the day of your fall.

name: Ezekiel 32:11
text: For thus says the Lord Yahweh: The sword of the king of Babylon shall come on you.

name: Ezekiel 32:12
text: By the swords of the mighty will I cause your multitude to fall; the terrible of the nations are they all: and they shall bring to nothing the pride of Egypt, and all its multitude shall be destroyed.

name: Ezekiel 32:13
text: I will destroy also all its animals from beside many waters; neither shall the foot of man trouble them any more, nor the hoofs of animals trouble them.

name: Ezekiel 32:14
text: Then will I make their waters clear, and cause their rivers to run like oil, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 32:15
text: When I shall make the land of Egypt desolate and waste, a land destitute of that of which it was full, when I shall strike all those who dwell therein, then shall they know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 32:16
text: This is the lamentation with which they shall lament; the daughters of the nations shall lament therewith; over Egypt, and over all her multitude, shall they lament therewith, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 32:17
text: It happened also in the twelfth year, in the fifteenth day of the month, that the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 32:18
text: Son of man, wail for the multitude of Egypt, and cast them down, even her, and the daughters of the famous nations, to the lower parts of the earth, with those who go down into the pit.

name: Ezekiel 32:19
text: Whom do you pass in beauty? Go down, and be laid with the uncircumcised.

name: Ezekiel 32:20
text: They shall fall in the midst of those who are slain by the sword: she is delivered to the sword; draw her away and all her multitudes.

name: Ezekiel 32:21
text: The strong among the mighty shall speak to him out of the midst of Sheol with those who help him: they are gone down, they lie still, even the uncircumcised, slain by the sword.

name: Ezekiel 32:22
text: Asshur is there and all her company; her graves are all around her; all of them slain, fallen by the sword;

name: Ezekiel 32:23
text: whose graves are set in the uttermost parts of the pit, and her company is around her grave; all of them slain, fallen by the sword, who caused terror in the land of the living.

name: Ezekiel 32:24
text: There is Elam and all her multitude around her grave; all of them slain, fallen by the sword, who are gone down uncircumcised into the lower parts of the earth, who caused their terror in the land of the living, and have borne their shame with those who go down to the pit.

name: Ezekiel 32:25
text: They have set her a bed in the midst of the slain with all her multitude; her graves are around her; all of them uncircumcised, slain by the sword; for their terror was caused in the land of the living, and they have borne their shame with those who go down to the pit: he is put in the midst of those who are slain.

name: Ezekiel 32:26
text: There is Meshech, Tubal, and all their multitude; their graves are around them; all of them uncircumcised, slain by the sword; for they caused their terror in the land of the living.

name: Ezekiel 32:27
text: They shall not lie with the mighty who are fallen of the uncircumcised, who are gone down to Sheol with their weapons of war, and have laid their swords under their heads, and their iniquities are on their bones; for they were the terror of the mighty in the land of the living.

name: Ezekiel 32:28
text: But you shall be broken in the midst of the uncircumcised, and shall lie with those who are slain by the sword.

name: Ezekiel 32:29
text: There is Edom, her kings and all her princes, who in their might are laid with those who are slain by the sword: they shall lie with the uncircumcised, and with those who go down to the pit.

name: Ezekiel 32:30
text: There are the princes of the north, all of them, and all the Sidonians, who are gone down with the slain; in the terror which they caused by their might they are put to shame; and they lie uncircumcised with those who are slain by the sword, and bear their shame with those who go down to the pit.

name: Ezekiel 32:31
text: Pharaoh shall see them, and shall be comforted over all his multitude, even Pharaoh and all his army, slain by the sword, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 32:32
text: For I have put his terror in the land of the living; and he shall be laid in the midst of the uncircumcised, with those who are slain by the sword, even Pharaoh and all his multitude, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 33:1
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 33:2
text: Son of man, speak to the children of your people, and tell them, When I bring the sword on a land, and the people of the land take a man from among them, and set him for their watchman;

name: Ezekiel 33:3
text: if, when he sees the sword come on the land, he blow the trumpet, and warn the people;

name: Ezekiel 33:4
text: then whoever hears the sound of the trumpet, and doesn"t take warning, if the sword come, and take him away, his blood shall be on his own head.

name: Ezekiel 33:5
text: He heard the sound of the trumpet, and didn"t take warning; his blood shall be on him; whereas if he had taken warning, he would have delivered his soul.

name: Ezekiel 33:6
text: But if the watchman sees the sword come, and doesn"t blow the trumpet, and the people aren"t warned, and the sword comes, and take any person from among them; he is taken away in his iniquity, but his blood will I require at the watchman"s hand.

name: Ezekiel 33:7
text: So you, son of man, I have set you a watchman to the house of Israel; therefore hear the word at my mouth, and give them warning from me.

name: Ezekiel 33:8
text: When I tell the wicked, O wicked man, you shall surely die, and you don"t speak to warn the wicked from his way; that wicked man shall die in his iniquity, but his blood will I require at your hand.

name: Ezekiel 33:9
text: Nevertheless, if you warn the wicked of his way to turn from it, and he doesn"t turn from his way; he shall die in his iniquity, but you have delivered your soul.

name: Ezekiel 33:10
text: You, son of man, tell the house of Israel: Thus you speak, saying, Our transgressions and our sins are on us, and we pine away in them; how then can we live?

name: Ezekiel 33:11
text: Tell them, As I live, says the Lord Yahweh, I have no pleasure in the death of the wicked; but that the wicked turn from his way and live: turn, turn from your evil ways; for why will you die, house of Israel?

name: Ezekiel 33:12
text: You, son of man, tell the children of your people, The righteousness of the righteous shall not deliver him in the day of his disobedience; and as for the wickedness of the wicked, he shall not fall thereby in the day that he turns from his wickedness; neither shall he who is righteous be able to live thereby in the day that he sins.

name: Ezekiel 33:13
text: When I tell the righteous, that he shall surely live; if he trust to his righteousness, and commit iniquity, none of his righteous deeds shall be remembered; but in his iniquity that he has committed, therein shall he die.

name: Ezekiel 33:14
text: Again, when I say to the wicked, You shall surely die; if he turn from his sin, and do that which is lawful and right;

name: Ezekiel 33:15
text: if the wicked restore the pledge, give again that which he had taken by robbery, walk in the statutes of life, committing no iniquity; he shall surely live, he shall not die.

name: Ezekiel 33:16
text: None of his sins that he has committed shall be remembered against him: he has done that which is lawful and right; he shall surely live.

name: Ezekiel 33:17
text: Yet the children of your people say, The way of the Lord is not equal: but as for them, their way is not equal.

name: Ezekiel 33:18
text: When the righteous turns from his righteousness, and commits iniquity, he shall even die therein.

name: Ezekiel 33:19
text: When the wicked turns from his wickedness, and does that which is lawful and right, he shall live thereby.

name: Ezekiel 33:20
text: Yet you say, The way of the Lord is not equal. House of Israel, I will judge every one of you after his ways.

name: Ezekiel 33:21
text: It happened in the twelfth year of our captivity, in the tenth month, in the fifth day of the month, that one who had escaped out of Jerusalem came to me, saying, The city has been struck.

name: Ezekiel 33:22
text: Now the hand of Yahweh had been on me in the evening, before he who was escaped came; and he had opened my mouth, until he came to me in the morning; and my mouth was opened, and I was no more mute.

name: Ezekiel 33:23
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 33:24
text: Son of man, they who inhabit those waste places in the land of Israel speak, saying, Abraham was one, and he inherited the land: but we are many; the land is given us for inheritance.

name: Ezekiel 33:25
text: Therefore tell them, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: You eat with the blood, and lift up your eyes to your idols, and shed blood: and shall you possess the land?

name: Ezekiel 33:26
text: You stand on your sword, you work abomination, and every one of you defiles his neighbor"s wife: and shall you possess the land?

name: Ezekiel 33:27
text: You shall tell them, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: As I live, surely those who are in the waste places shall fall by the sword; and him who is in the open field will I give to the animals to be devoured; and those who are in the strongholds and in the caves shall die of the pestilence.

name: Ezekiel 33:28
text: I will make the land a desolation and an astonishment; and the pride of her power shall cease; and the mountains of Israel shall be desolate, so that none shall pass through.

name: Ezekiel 33:29
text: Then shall they know that I am Yahweh, when I have made the land a desolation and an astonishment, because of all their abominations which they have committed.

name: Ezekiel 33:30
text: As for you, son of man, the children of your people talk of you by the walls and in the doors of the houses, and speak one to another, everyone to his brother, saying, Please come and hear what is the word that comes forth from Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 33:31
text: They come to you as the people come, and they sit before you as my people, and they hear your words, but don"t do them; for with their mouth they show much love, but their heart goes after their gain.

name: Ezekiel 33:32
text: Behold, you are to them as a very lovely song of one who has a pleasant voice, and can play well on an instrument; for they hear your words, but they don"t do them.

name: Ezekiel 33:33
text: When this comes to pass, (behold, it comes), then shall they know that a prophet has been among them.

name: Ezekiel 34:1
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 34:2
text: Son of man, prophesy against the shepherds of Israel, prophesy, and tell them, even to the shepherds, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Woe to the shepherds of Israel who feed themselves! Shouldn"t the shepherds feed the sheep?

name: Ezekiel 34:3
text: You eat the fat, and you clothe yourself with the wool, you kill the fatlings; but you don"t feed the sheep.

name: Ezekiel 34:4
text: You haven"t strengthened the diseased, neither have you healed that which was sick, neither have you bound up that which was broken, neither have you brought back that which was driven away, neither have you sought that which was lost; but with force and with rigor you have ruled over them.

name: Ezekiel 34:5
text: They were scattered, because there was no shepherd; and they became food to all the animals of the field, and were scattered.

name: Ezekiel 34:6
text: My sheep wandered through all the mountains, and on every high hill: yes, my sheep were scattered on all the surface of the earth; and there was none who searched or sought.

name: Ezekiel 34:7
text: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of Yahweh:

name: Ezekiel 34:8
text: As I live, says the Lord Yahweh, surely because my sheep became a prey, and my sheep became food to all the animals of the field, because there was no shepherd, neither did my shepherds search for my sheep, but the shepherds fed themselves, and didn"t feed my sheep;

name: Ezekiel 34:9
text: therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of Yahweh:

name: Ezekiel 34:10
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I am against the shepherds; and I will require my sheep at their hand, and cause them to cease from feeding the sheep; neither shall the shepherds feed themselves any more; and I will deliver my sheep from their mouth, that they may not be food for them.

name: Ezekiel 34:11
text: For thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I myself, even I, will search for my sheep, and will seek them out.

name: Ezekiel 34:12
text: As a shepherd seeks out his flock in the day that he is among his sheep that are scattered abroad, so will I seek out my sheep; and I will deliver them out of all places where they have been scattered in the cloudy and dark day.

name: Ezekiel 34:13
text: I will bring them out from the peoples, and gather them from the countries, and will bring them into their own land; and I will feed them on the mountains of Israel, by the watercourses, and in all the inhabited places of the country.

name: Ezekiel 34:14
text: I will feed them with good pasture; and on the mountains of the height of Israel shall their fold be: there shall they lie down in a good fold; and on fat pasture shall they feed on the mountains of Israel.

name: Ezekiel 34:15
text: I myself will be the shepherd of my sheep, and I will cause them to lie down, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 34:16
text: I will seek that which was lost, and will bring back that which was driven away, and will bind up that which was broken, and will strengthen that which was sick: but the fat and the strong I will destroy; I will feed them in justice.

name: Ezekiel 34:17
text: As for you, O my flock, thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I judge between sheep and sheep, the rams and the male goats.

name: Ezekiel 34:18
text: Does it seem a small thing to you to have fed on the good pasture, but you must tread down with your feet the residue of your pasture? and to have drunk of the clear waters, but you must foul the residue with your feet?

name: Ezekiel 34:19
text: As for my sheep, they eat that which you have trodden with your feet, and they drink that which you have fouled with your feet.

name: Ezekiel 34:20
text: Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh to them: Behold, I, even I, will judge between the fat sheep and the lean sheep.

name: Ezekiel 34:21
text: Because you thrust with side and with shoulder, and push all the diseased with your horns, until you have scattered them abroad;

name: Ezekiel 34:22
text: therefore will I save my flock, and they shall no more be a prey; and I will judge between sheep and sheep.

name: Ezekiel 34:23
text: I will set up one shepherd over them, and he shall feed them, even my servant David; he shall feed them, and he shall be their shepherd.

name: Ezekiel 34:24
text: I, Yahweh, will be their God, and my servant David prince among them; I, Yahweh, have spoken it.

name: Ezekiel 34:25
text: I will make with them a covenant of peace, and will cause evil animals to cease out of the land; and they shall dwell securely in the wilderness, and sleep in the woods.

name: Ezekiel 34:26
text: I will make them and the places around my hill a blessing; and I will cause the shower to come down in its season; there shall be showers of blessing.

name: Ezekiel 34:27
text: The tree of the field shall yield its fruit, and the earth shall yield its increase, and they shall be secure in their land; and they shall know that I am Yahweh, when I have broken the bars of their yoke, and have delivered them out of the hand of those who made slaves of them.

name: Ezekiel 34:28
text: They shall no more be a prey to the nations, neither shall the animals of the earth devour them; but they shall dwell securely, and none shall make them afraid.

name: Ezekiel 34:29
text: I will raise up to them a plantation for renown, and they shall be no more consumed with famine in the land, neither bear the shame of the nations any more.

name: Ezekiel 34:30
text: They shall know that I, Yahweh, their God am with them, and that they, the house of Israel, are my people, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 34:31
text: You my sheep, the sheep of my pasture, are men, and I am your God, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 35:1
text: Moreover the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 35:2
text: Son of man, set your face against Mount Seir, and prophesy against it,

name: Ezekiel 35:3
text: and tell it, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I am against you, Mount Seir, and I will stretch out my hand against you, and I will make you a desolation and an astonishment.

name: Ezekiel 35:4
text: I will lay your cities waste, and you shall be desolate; and you shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 35:5
text: Because you have had a perpetual enmity, and have given over the children of Israel to the power of the sword in the time of their calamity, in the time of the iniquity of the end;

name: Ezekiel 35:6
text: therefore, as I live, says the Lord Yahweh, I will prepare you for blood, and blood shall pursue you: since you have not hated blood, therefore blood shall pursue you.

name: Ezekiel 35:7
text: Thus will I make Mount Seir an astonishment and a desolation; and I will cut off from it him who passes through and him who returns.

name: Ezekiel 35:8
text: I will fill its mountains with its slain: in your hills and in your valleys and in all your watercourses shall they fall who are slain with the sword.

name: Ezekiel 35:9
text: I will make you a perpetual desolation, and your cities shall not be inhabited; and you shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 35:10
text: Because you have said, These two nations and these two countries shall be mine, and we will possess it; whereas Yahweh was there:

name: Ezekiel 35:11
text: therefore, as I live, says the Lord Yahweh, I will do according to your anger, and according to your envy which you have shown out of your hatred against them; and I will make myself known among them, when I shall judge you.

name: Ezekiel 35:12
text: You shall know that I, Yahweh, have heard all your insults which you have spoken against the mountains of Israel, saying, They are laid desolate, they have been given us to devour.

name: Ezekiel 35:13
text: You have magnified yourselves against me with your mouth, and have multiplied your words against me: I have heard it.

name: Ezekiel 35:14
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: When the whole earth rejoices, I will make you desolate.

name: Ezekiel 35:15
text: As you rejoiced over the inheritance of the house of Israel, because it was desolate, so will I do to you: you shall be desolate, Mount Seir, and all Edom, even all of it; and they shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 36:1
text: You, son of man, prophesy to the mountains of Israel, and say, You mountains of Israel, hear the word of Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 36:2
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Because the enemy has said against you, Aha! and, The ancient high places are ours in possession;

name: Ezekiel 36:3
text: therefore prophesy, and say, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Because, even because they have made you desolate, and swallowed you up on every side, that you might be a possession to the residue of the nations, and you are taken up in the lips of talkers, and the evil report of the people;

name: Ezekiel 36:4
text: therefore, you mountains of Israel, hear the word of the Lord Yahweh: Thus says the Lord Yahweh to the mountains and to the hills, to the watercourses and to the valleys, to the desolate wastes and to the cities that are forsaken, which are become a prey and derision to the residue of the nations that are all around;

name: Ezekiel 36:5
text: therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: Surely in the fire of my jealousy have I spoken against the residue of the nations, and against all Edom, that have appointed my land to themselves for a possession with the joy of all their heart, with despite of soul, to cast it out for a prey.

name: Ezekiel 36:6
text: Therefore prophesy concerning the land of Israel, and tell the mountains and to the hills, to the watercourses and to the valleys, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I have spoken in my jealousy and in my wrath, because you have borne the shame of the nations:

name: Ezekiel 36:7
text: therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh: I have sworn, saying, Surely the nations that are around you, they shall bear their shame.

name: Ezekiel 36:8
text: But you, mountains of Israel, you shall shoot forth your branches, and yield your fruit to my people Israel; for they are at hand to come.

name: Ezekiel 36:9
text: For, behold, I am for you, and I will turn into you, and you shall be tilled and sown;

name: Ezekiel 36:10
text: and I will multiply men on you, all the house of Israel, even all of it; and the cities shall be inhabited, and the waste places shall be built;

name: Ezekiel 36:11
text: and I will multiply on you man and animal; and they shall increase and be fruitful; and I will cause you to be inhabited after your former estate, and will do better to you than at your beginnings: and you shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 36:12
text: Yes, I will cause men to walk on you, even my people Israel; and they shall possess you, and you shall be their inheritance, and you shall no more henceforth bereave them of children.

name: Ezekiel 36:13
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Because they say to you, You are a devourer of men, and have been a bereaver of your nation;

name: Ezekiel 36:14
text: therefore you shall devour men no more, neither bereave your nation any more, says the Lord Yahweh;

name: Ezekiel 36:15
text: neither will I let you hear any more the shame of the nations, neither shall you bear the reproach of the peoples any more, neither shall you cause your nation to stumble any more, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 36:16
text: Moreover the word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 36:17
text: Son of man, when the house of Israel lived in their own land, they defiled it by their way and by their doings: their way before me was as the uncleanness of a woman in her impurity.

name: Ezekiel 36:18
text: Therefore I poured out my wrath on them for the blood which they had poured out on the land, and because they had defiled it with their idols;

name: Ezekiel 36:19
text: and I scattered them among the nations, and they were dispersed through the countries: according to their way and according to their doings I judged them.

name: Ezekiel 36:20
text: When they came to the nations, where they went, they profaned my holy name; in that men said of them, These are the people of Yahweh, and are gone forth out of his land.

name: Ezekiel 36:21
text: But I had respect for my holy name, which the house of Israel had profaned among the nations, where they went.

name: Ezekiel 36:22
text: Therefore tell the house of Israel, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: I don"t do this for your sake, house of Israel, but for my holy name, which you have profaned among the nations, where you went.

name: Ezekiel 36:23
text: I will sanctify my great name, which has been profaned among the nations, which you have profaned in their midst; and the nations shall know that I am Yahweh, says the Lord Yahweh, when I shall be sanctified in you before their eyes.

name: Ezekiel 36:24
text: For I will take you from among the nations, and gather you out of all the countries, and will bring you into your own land.

name: Ezekiel 36:25
text: I will sprinkle clean water on you, and you shall be clean: from all your filthiness, and from all your idols, will I cleanse you.

name: Ezekiel 36:26
text: I will also give you a new heart, and I will put a new spirit within you; and I will take away the stony heart out of your flesh, and I will give you a heart of flesh.

name: Ezekiel 36:27
text: I will put my Spirit within you, and cause you to walk in my statutes, and you shall keep my ordinances, and do them.

name: Ezekiel 36:28
text: You shall dwell in the land that I gave to your fathers; and you shall be my people, and I will be your God.

name: Ezekiel 36:29
text: I will save you from all your uncleanness: and I will call for the grain, and will multiply it, and lay no famine on you.

name: Ezekiel 36:30
text: I will multiply the fruit of the tree, and the increase of the field, that you may receive no more the reproach of famine among the nations.

name: Ezekiel 36:31
text: Then you shall remember your evil ways, and your doings that were not good; and you shall loathe yourselves in your own sight for your iniquities and for your abominations.

name: Ezekiel 36:32
text: Nor for your sake do I this, says the Lord Yahweh, be it known to you: be ashamed and confounded for your ways, house of Israel.

name: Ezekiel 36:33
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: In the day that I cleanse you from all your iniquities, I will cause the cities to be inhabited, and the waste places shall be built.

name: Ezekiel 36:34
text: The land that was desolate shall be tilled, whereas it was a desolation in the sight of all who passed by.

name: Ezekiel 36:35
text: They shall say, This land that was desolate has become like the garden of Eden; and the waste and desolate and ruined cities are fortified and inhabited.

name: Ezekiel 36:36
text: Then the nations that are left around you shall know that I, Yahweh, have built the ruined places, and planted that which was desolate: I, Yahweh, have spoken it, and I will do it.

name: Ezekiel 36:37
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: For this, moreover, will I be inquired of by the house of Israel, to do it for them: I will increase them with men like a flock.

name: Ezekiel 36:38
text: As the flock for sacrifice, as the flock of Jerusalem in her appointed feasts, so shall the waste cities be filled with flocks of men; and they shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 37:1
text: The hand of Yahweh was on me, and he brought me out in the Spirit of Yahweh, and set me down in the midst of the valley; and it was full of bones.

name: Ezekiel 37:2
text: He caused me to pass by them all around: and behold, there were very many in the open valley; and behold, they were very dry.

name: Ezekiel 37:3
text: He said to me, Son of man, can these bones live? I answered, Lord Yahweh, you know.

name: Ezekiel 37:4
text: Again he said to me, Prophesy over these bones, and tell them, you dry bones, hear the word of Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 37:5
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh to these bones: Behold, I will cause breath to enter into you, and you shall live.

name: Ezekiel 37:6
text: I will lay sinews on you, and will bring up flesh on you, and cover you with skin, and put breath in you, and you shall live; and you shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 37:7
text: So I prophesied as I was commanded: and as I prophesied, there was a noise, and behold, an earthquake; and the bones came together, bone to its bone.

name: Ezekiel 37:8
text: I saw, and, behold, there were sinews on them, and flesh came up, and skin covered them above; but there was no breath in them.

name: Ezekiel 37:9
text: Then he said to me, Prophesy to the wind, prophesy, son of man, and tell the wind, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Come from the four winds, breath, and breathe on these slain, that they may live.

name: Ezekiel 37:10
text: So I prophesied as he commanded me, and the breath came into them, and they lived, and stood up on their feet, an exceedingly great army.

name: Ezekiel 37:11
text: Then he said to me, Son of man, these bones are the whole house of Israel: behold, they say, Our bones are dried up, and our hope is lost; we are clean cut off.

name: Ezekiel 37:12
text: Therefore prophesy, and tell them, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I will open your graves, and cause you to come up out of your graves, my people; and I will bring you into the land of Israel.

name: Ezekiel 37:13
text: You shall know that I am Yahweh, when I have opened your graves, and caused you to come up out of your graves, my people.

name: Ezekiel 37:14
text: I will put my Spirit in you, and you shall live, and I will place you in your own land: and you shall know that I, Yahweh, have spoken it and performed it, says Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 37:15
text: The word of Yahweh came again to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 37:16
text: You, son of man, take one stick, and write on it, For Judah, and for the children of Israel his companions: then take another stick, and write on it, For Joseph, the stick of Ephraim, and for all the house of Israel his companions:

name: Ezekiel 37:17
text: and join them for you one to another into one stick, that they may become one in your hand.

name: Ezekiel 37:18
text: When the children of your people shall speak to you, saying, Will you not show us what you mean by these?

name: Ezekiel 37:19
text: tell them, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I will take the stick of Joseph, which is in the hand of Ephraim, and the tribes of Israel his companions; and I will put them with it, even with the stick of Judah, and make them one stick, and they shall be one in my hand.

name: Ezekiel 37:20
text: The sticks whereon you write shall be in your hand before their eyes.

name: Ezekiel 37:21
text: Say to them, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I will take the children of Israel from among the nations, where they are gone, and will gather them on every side, and bring them into their own land:

name: Ezekiel 37:22
text: and I will make them one nation in the land, on the mountains of Israel; and one king shall be king to them all; and they shall be no more two nations, neither shall they be divided into two kingdoms any more at all;

name: Ezekiel 37:23
text: neither shall they defile themselves any more with their idols, nor with their detestable things, nor with any of their transgressions; but I will save them out of all their dwelling places, in which they have sinned, and will cleanse them: so shall they be my people, and I will be their God.

name: Ezekiel 37:24
text: My servant David shall be king over them; and they all shall have one shepherd: they shall also walk in my ordinances, and observe my statutes, and do them.

name: Ezekiel 37:25
text: They shall dwell in the land that I have given to Jacob my servant, in which your fathers lived; and they shall dwell therein, they, and their children, and their children"s children, forever: and David my servant shall be their prince for ever.

name: Ezekiel 37:26
text: Moreover I will make a covenant of peace with them; it shall be an everlasting covenant with them; and I will place them, and multiply them, and will set my sanctuary in their midst forevermore.

name: Ezekiel 37:27
text: My tent also shall be with them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.

name: Ezekiel 37:28
text: The nations shall know that I am Yahweh who sanctifies Israel, when my sanctuary shall be in their midst forevermore.

name: Ezekiel 38:1
text: The word of Yahweh came to me, saying,

name: Ezekiel 38:2
text: Son of man, set your face toward Gog, of the land of Magog, the prince of Rosh, Meshech, and Tubal, and prophesy against him,

name: Ezekiel 38:3
text: and say, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I am against you, Gog, prince of Rosh, Meshech, and Tubal:

name: Ezekiel 38:4
text: and I will turn you around, and put hooks into your jaws, and I will bring you forth, with all your army, horses and horsemen, all of them clothed in full armor, a great company with buckler and shield, all of them handling swords;

name: Ezekiel 38:5
text: Persia, Cush, and Put with them, all of them with shield and helmet;

name: Ezekiel 38:6
text: Gomer, and all his hordes; the house of Togarmah in the uttermost parts of the north, and all his hordes; even many peoples with you.

name: Ezekiel 38:7
text: Be prepared, yes, prepare yourself, you, and all your companies who are assembled to you, and be a guard to them.

name: Ezekiel 38:8
text: After many days you shall be visited: in the latter years you shall come into the land that is brought back from the sword, that is gathered out of many peoples, on the mountains of Israel, which have been a continual waste; but it is brought forth out of the peoples, and they shall dwell securely, all of them.

name: Ezekiel 38:9
text: You shall ascend, you shall come like a storm, you shall be like a cloud to cover the land, you, and all your hordes, and many peoples with you.

name: Ezekiel 38:10
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: It shall happen in that day, that things shall come into your mind, and you shall devise an evil device:

name: Ezekiel 38:11
text: and you shall say, I will go up to the land of unwalled villages; I will go to those who are at rest, who dwell securely, all of them dwelling without walls, and having neither bars nor gates;

name: Ezekiel 38:12
text: to take the spoil and to take the prey; to turn your hand against the waste places that are now inhabited, and against the people who are gathered out of the nations, who have gotten livestock and goods, who dwell in the middle of the earth.

name: Ezekiel 38:13
text: Sheba, and Dedan, and the merchants of Tarshish, with all the young lions of it, shall tell you, Have you come to take the spoil? have you assembled your company to take the prey? to carry away silver and gold, to take away livestock and goods, to take great spoil?

name: Ezekiel 38:14
text: Therefore, son of man, prophesy, and tell Gog, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: In that day when my people Israel dwells securely, shall you not know it?

name: Ezekiel 38:15
text: You shall come from your place out of the uttermost parts of the north, you, and many peoples with you, all of them riding on horses, a great company and a mighty army;

name: Ezekiel 38:16
text: and you shall come up against my people Israel, as a cloud to cover the land: it shall happen in the latter days, that I will bring you against my land, that the nations may know me, when I shall be sanctified in you, Gog, before their eyes.

name: Ezekiel 38:17
text: Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Are you he of whom I spoke in old time by my servants the prophets of Israel, who prophesied in those days for many years that I would bring you against them?

name: Ezekiel 38:18
text: It shall happen in that day, when Gog shall come against the land of Israel, says the Lord Yahweh, that my wrath shall come up into my nostrils.

name: Ezekiel 38:19
text: For in my jealousy and in the fire of my wrath have I spoken, Surely in that day there shall be a great shaking in the land of Israel;

name: Ezekiel 38:20
text: so that the fish of the sea, and the birds of the sky, and the animals of the field, and all creeping things who creep on the earth, and all the men who are on the surface of the earth, shall shake at my presence, and the mountains shall be thrown down, and the steep places shall fall, and every wall shall fall to the ground.

name: Ezekiel 38:21
text: I will call for a sword against him to all my mountains, says the Lord Yahweh: every man"s sword shall be against his brother.

name: Ezekiel 38:22
text: With pestilence and with blood will I enter into judgment with him; and I will rain on him, and on his hordes, and on the many peoples who are with him, an overflowing shower, and great hailstones, fire, and sulfur.

name: Ezekiel 38:23
text: I will magnify myself, and sanctify myself, and I will make myself known in the eyes of many nations; and they shall know that I am Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 39:1
text: You, son of man, prophesy against Gog, and say, Thus says the Lord Yahweh: Behold, I am against you, Gog, prince of Rosh, Meshech, and Tubal:

name: Ezekiel 39:2
text: and I will turn you around, and will lead you on, and will cause you to come up from the uttermost parts of the north; and I will bring you on the mountains of Israel;

name: Ezekiel 39:3
text: and I will strike your bow out of your left hand, and will cause your arrows to fall out of your right hand.

name: Ezekiel 39:4
text: You shall fall on the mountains of Israel, you, and all your hordes, and the peoples who are with you: I will give you to the ravenous birds of every sort, and to the animals of the field to be devoured.

name: Ezekiel 39:5
text: You shall fall on the open field; for I have spoken it, says the Lord Yahweh.

name: Ezekiel 39:6
text: I will send a fire on Magog, and on those who dwell securely in the islands; and they shall know that I am Yahweh.
